Key Arguments: The proposed legislation represents governmental overreach by potentially restricting freedom of speech.
There is concern that the government and large media outlets will control who can post on social media.
The legislation could prevent Christians and people of faith from sharing their values online.
Freedom of speech is essential for a democratic society, and the bill threatens this principle.
Notable Quotes: I am very concerned about the proposed Misinformation and Disinformation bill.
By generalising and preventing people or groups at one's own discretion from speaking their mind on social media is in my view a governmental overreach.
Freedom of speech is the backbone of a democratic society, and this bill has the power to break that backbone.
